description: Add or remove related items from the related items tab of an incident record.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A token that ensures that a client calls the operation only once with the specified details. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: incidentRecordArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the incident record that contains the related items that you update.

parameters.name: relatedItemsUpdate
parameters.description: Details about the item that you are add to, or delete from, an incident. itemToAdd (dict) --- Details about the related item you're adding. generatedId (string) --- A unique ID for a RelatedItem. Details about the related item. The type of related item. arn (string) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the related item, if the related item is an Amazon resource. metricDefinition (string) --- The metric definition, if the related item is a metric in Amazon CloudWatch. pagerDutyIncidentDetail (dict) --- Details about an incident that is associated with a PagerDuty incident. autoResolve (boolean) --- Indicates whether to resolve the PagerDuty incident when you resolve the associated Incident Manager incident. The ID of the incident associated with the PagerDuty service for the response plan. secretId (string) --- The ID of the Amazon Web Services Secrets Manager secret that stores your PagerDuty key, either a General Access REST API Key or User Token REST API Key, and other user credentials. url (string) --- The URL, if the related item is a non-Amazon Web Services resource. title (string) --- The title of the related item. itemToRemove (dict) --- Details about the related item you're deleting. url (string) --- The URL, if the related item is a non-Amazon Web Services resource.

nested_params.name: itemToAdd
nested_params.description: Details about the related item you're adding.

nested_params.name: generatedId
nested_params.description: A unique ID for a RelatedItem.

nested_params.name: identifier
nested_params.description: Details about the related item.

nested_params.name: type
nested_params.description: The type of related item.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: Details about the related item.

nested_params.name: arn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the related item, if the related item is an Amazon resource.

nested_params.name: metricDefinition
nested_params.description: The metric definition, if the related item is a metric in Amazon CloudWatch.

nested_params.name: pagerDutyIncidentDetail
nested_params.description: Details about an incident that is associated with a PagerDuty incident.

nested_params.name: autoResolve
nested_params.description: Indicates whether to resolve the PagerDuty incident when you resolve the associated Incident Manager incident.

nested_params.name: id
nested_params.description: The ID of the incident associated with the PagerDuty service for the response plan.

nested_params.name: secretId
nested_params.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services Secrets Manager secret that stores your PagerDuty key, either a General Access REST API Key or User Token REST API Key, and other user credentials.

nested_params.name: url
nested_params.description: The URL, if the related item is a non-Amazon Web Services resource.

nested_params.name: title
nested_params.description: The title of the related item.

nested_params.name: itemToRemove
nested_params.description: Details about the related item you're deleting.

nested_params.name: type
nested_params.description: The type of related item.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: Details about the related item.

nested_params.name: arn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the related item, if the related item is an Amazon resource.

nested_params.name: metricDefinition
nested_params.description: The metric definition, if the related item is a metric in Amazon CloudWatch.

nested_params.name: pagerDutyIncidentDetail
nested_params.description: Details about an incident that is associated with a PagerDuty incident.

nested_params.name: autoResolve
nested_params.description: Indicates whether to resolve the PagerDuty incident when you resolve the associated Incident Manager incident.

nested_params.description: The ID of the incident associated with the PagerDuty service for the response plan.

nested_params.name: secretId
nested_params.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services Secrets Manager secret that stores your PagerDuty key, either a General Access REST API Key or User Token REST API Key, and other user credentials.

nested_params.description: The URL, if the related item is a non-Amazon Web Services resource.
